author: Staff Reporter
text:
Malayalis in Tirupur knitwear cluster on Sunday paid floral tributes and recollected the literary contributions made by Jnanpith and Padma Vibhusan awards winner O.N.V. Kurup, the legendary poet who died on Saturday evening.

Special prayers

Sasi Kunissery, the executive committee member of Tirupur Kerala Samajam, said special prayers were offered as a mark of respect to ‘ONV’ who was a household name in Kerala, both for his poetry and for the lyrics he scored for many hundreds of Malayalam movies.

He had also won the national award for Best Lyricist in 1989 and Best Lyricist State award on 13 occasions.
title: Tributes paid to O.N.V. Kurup
